articles.title: Second-day Meeting of 5th Conference of WPK Cell Chairpersons Held
articles.content:
Second-day Meeting of 5th Conference of WPK Cell Chairpersons Held
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The second-day meeting of the 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place on Dec. 22.
					 Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, and members of the Executive Policy Council of the Central Committee of the WPK took the platform to guide the conference.
					
					 The leading officials of the central and provincial Party committees also took the platform.
					
					 The conference continued under the guidance of the Chairman of the WPK.
					
					 The participants, who more keenly felt, through the first-day meeting, the importance of the conference in enhancing the militant might of the Party in every way, as required by the developing revolution, had in-depth discussions on the measures to make all the Party cells faithful ones and the reliable vanguard for implementing the Party policies by enhancing the role of the cell chairpersons.
					
					 At the second-day meeting, cell chairpersons of the Party committees of units at all levels, in their speeches, continued to analyze and review their achievements and experience in strengthening their cells, the lower-echelon organizations of the Party, and the shortcomings and causes in their cell work.
					
					 Speakers told about the successes and experience gained in making their Party cells faithful ones equipped with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the true vanguard organizations sharing their fate with our Party to the last, as intended by the Party Central Committee after the 4th Conference of Cell Secretaries of the WPK.
					
					 They also referred to the fact that they strengthened their Party cells, prioritizing the work for preparing all the Party members to be true Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists and meticulously guiding the organizational and ideological life of Party members, and thus help them play the flagship role in the building of a powerful socialist country.
					
					 Listening to the speeches, the participants realized again that the example of party cell chairpersons is the mighty political work, and the validity and vitality of the mass work method of the Party to make cell work the one with the minds of the people.
					
					 The meeting analyzed such defects and shortcomings in party cell work of some units as failing to meet the requirements of the era and developing revolution and discussed the ways to overcome them.
					
					 It was said that some Party cells failed to properly arouse Party members and other working people to the drive for implementing the last instructions of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and some cell chairpersons failed to get rid of the wrong ideological viewpoints and idling working styles like defeatism, formalism, expedientialism and self-protection and the ranks of Party cell chairpersons have not been built well and meticulous work to help and teach them has not been done.
					
					 The meeting also discussed the measures to make all the Party cell chairpersons bear in mind their mission and duty in implementing the Party policies in order to bring about a fresh turn in the ideological viewpoint and working style and manner.
					
					 The conference continues.

articles.title: Congratulations to Chilean President-elect
articles.content:
Congratulations to Chilean President-elect
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Sebastian Pinera Echenique on his election as president of the Republic of Chile.
					 The message wished the president success in his responsible work, expressing belief that the bilateral relations would grow strong in all fields in the common interests of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Solidarity with Just Cause of Palestinians and Arab People Expressed
articles.content:
Solidarity with Just Cause of Palestinians and Arab People Expressed
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The DPRK permanent representative at the United Nations Thursday made a speech at an emergency special meeting of the UN General Assembly.
					 He said:
					
					 The international community strengthens its cooperation more than ever to put an end to the confrontation and contradiction between Palestine and Israel which lasted for over half a century and to ensure lasting peace in the Middle East. 
					
					 At the 17th Summit of the Non-Aligned Movement (NAM) held in Venezuela in September last year, the heads of states and governments reaffirmed their commitment to defend the interests of developing countries in the issues directly related to world peace and security such as the situation in the Middle East including the question of Palestine by promoting multilateralism especially by strengthening key role of the United Nations. 
					
					 Furthermore, last December the United Nations Security Council adopted the resolution which urged Israel to stop the illegal construction of settlement area of Jews in the West Bank and East-al-Quds.
					
					 The DPRK delegation believes that the decision by U.S. President Trump to recognize Kuds as the capital of Israel and to move the U.S. embassy there well deserves a global condemnation and rejection as it is an open defiance of and an insult to the international legitimacy and to a unanimous will of the international society.
					
					 The status of Kuds remains so sensitive that it, for sure, should be solved fairly by means of regaining the national rights of the Palestinian people and striking a comprehensive and lasting solution to the Middle East problem.
					
					 The U.S. and Israel should bear full responsibility for all the consequences of tension and instability that will be entailed in the Middle East region owing to its reckless and highhanded act.
					
					 They should pay due attention to the efforts of the international community to solve the issue of the Middle East including question of Palestine in conformity with international law and other relevant UNSC resolutions for the benefit of the Palestinian and Arab people and attend the Middle East Peace Process with honesty and diligence.
					
					 My delegation avails itself of this opportunity to reiterate its support and encouragement to the struggle of Palestinian people retrieving their legitimate right to setting up the independent state with East-al-Quds as its capital and to the struggle of the Arab people for their cause of justice.

articles.title: SPA Presidium Decides to Establish Kangnam Economic Development Park
articles.content:
SPA Presidium Decides to Establish Kangnam Economic Development Park
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea decided to establish Kangnam Economic Development Park in several parts of Koup-ri, Kangnam County of Pyongyang.
					 The DPRK is to exercise sovereignty over Kangnam Economic Development Park.
					
					 A decree on the decision of the SPA Presidium was promulgated on Thursday.

articles.title: Wreaths Sent to Bust of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Wreaths Sent to Bust of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the family of Ya. T. Nobichenko, an internationalist soldier, sent wreaths to the bust of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk in the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong on the occasion of the centenary of her birth.
					 The wreaths were laid before the bust on Saturday.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued to Mark Centenary of Birth of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued to Mark Centenary of Birth of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea issued new stamps (one sheetlet) to commemorate the centenary of birth of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Seen in the sheetlet are stamps showing art pieces depicting the image of Kim Jong Suk, who protected the safety of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Besides, there was a stamp showing an art piece depicting the great efforts made by Kim Jong Suk for building and developing the regular armed forces.
					
					 Seen on its upper and lower parts were letters "Centenary of birth of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk" and "Juche 6 (1917) - Juche 106 (2017)".

articles.title: Sinpha Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Sinpha Revolutionary Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
 Hyesan, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Sinpha Revolutionary Site draws many people in the run-up to the centenary of birth of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 More than five millions of servicepersons, working people of various circles, school youth and children have visited the site over past four decades since the statue of Kim Jong Suk was erected there on Oct. 10, Juche 63 (1974). In December this year alone, it is visited by at least thousands of people every day.
					
					 The site is a place where Kim Jong Suk waged an energetic struggle to expand organizations of the party and the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland at home, conducting her activities with Taoquanli as the base in the spring of 1937.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk, Outstanding Woman Revolutionary
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk, Outstanding Woman Revolutionary
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The number of visitors to the Hoeryong Revolutionary Site in Hoeryong City, North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK is on the steady increase.
					 According to data available, more than 300,000 servicepersons, working people from all walks of life, youth and students, overseas Koreans and foreigners visited the revolutionary site this year marking the centenary of the birth of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The revolutionary site is a historic place where Kim Jong Suk was born into a patriotic and revolutionary family and spent her childhood in the period of national sufferings.
					
					 In the spring of Juche 11 (1922), Kim Jong Suk crossed the Tuman River, following her family members who had to leave their native place, so distressed by the exploitation and oppression of the Japanese imperialist aggressors and their stooges.
					
					 She embarked on the road of revolution in her teens and performed undying feats in the struggle for liberating the country from Japan's colonial rule and building a new country under the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 There are her statue and the Hoeryong Revolutionary Museum at the revolutionary site. And her native home, Mangyang Ferry and other relics are preserved in their original states.
					
					 In an interview with KCNA in front of the native home, Kim Hyang Mi, a student of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk cultivated patriotism against the Japanese imperialists, suffering all sorts of misfortune and hardships, and dedicated her all to the country and nation. I will learn after the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and indomitable revolutionary spirit displayed by her to uphold the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un with loyalty.

articles.title: Mt Osong and Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership
articles.content:
Mt Osong and Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- November 24 is the 26th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 On this occasion, the army and people of the DPRK are recollecting with deep emotion the immortal feats of Kim Jong Il who made a long journey for Songun (military-first) leadership with ardent love for the country and trust in the people and servicepersons.
					
					 In his lifetime, he inspected a number of KPA units including frontline units in Chol Pass, Mt Osong, Cho Islet and Panmunjom.
					
					 In particular, Mt Osong is a historic place witnessing how many difficulties and ordeals he had overcome under the uplifted banner of Songun in the period of the Arduous March, the forced march.
					
					 He had kept on inspecting the unit on Mt Osong where anyone should pass through over 150 steep curves to reach its top.
					
					 It was one day in August Juche 87 (1998) that he left for the unit on Mt Osong despite of sloppy road due to a long spell of rainy weather. Pushing the car and tiding over dangerous moments to pass through the curves, he finally arrived at the forward command post on the top of the mountain and showed great loving care for servicepersons.
					
					 Later, he said that he had pursued the Songun politics to defend the country, noting that Mt Osong symbolic of Songun reminded him of the period of the Arduous March, the forced march.
					
					 Indeed, his ceaseless inspection for Songun revolutionary leadership was a long march of great devotion made by the peerlessly great man.
					
					 Therefore, Mt Osong will always shine as the symbol of Songun to eternize the immortal Songun exploits Kim Jong Il performed on behalf of the country and the people.

articles.title: Adding Eternal Shine to Kim Jong Il's Exploits of Building Juche-Oriented Revolutionary Armed Forces Called for
articles.content:
Adding Eternal Shine to Kim Jong Il's Exploits of Building Juche-Oriented Revolutionary Armed Forces Called for
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates an editorial to the 26th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The editorial says that holding Kim Jong Il, the peerless and brilliant commander of Songun, at the top post of the revolutionary armed forces on Dec. 24, Juche 80 (1991) was a historic event of special significance in carving out the destiny of the country and its people.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the peerless and brilliant commander of Songun who strengthened and developed the People's Army into the elite revolutionary armed forces and defended socialism and vigorously advanced it by dint of arms.
					
					 Under the grim situation which decided the destiny of the country and its people he resolutely chose the road of Songun, "do-or-die" one, and brought about a signal heyday of bolstering the military power with his indomitable revolutionary faith and will and matchless grit and pluck. The outposts for defending the country visited by him to ensure the eternal future of socialist Korea associated with the whole life of President Kim Il Sung bear witness to the ardent and patriotic devotion of the peerlessly great man.
					
					 On the road of the high-intensity forced march of the legendary and brilliant commander of Songun which could not be found in human history the KPA could be strengthened and developed into the revolutionary armed forces each man of which is a match for a hundred foes, the military miracles in which it has demonstrated only victories in the acute showdown with the imperialist allied forces were performed and the new era of building a powerful socialist nation was ushered in.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK can never forget the immortal and patriotic exploits of Kim Jong Il who set the example of the times in the struggle against the imperialists and the U.S. and provided the powerful Juche-oriented force for winning the final victory by pursuing the original Songun politics.
					
					 The editorial appeals to everyone to add eternal shine to his exploits of building the revolutionary armed forces and wage a dynamic struggle for final victory of the Juche revolutionary cause, united close around the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces' Act of Treachery Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces' Act of Treachery Flayed
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Kang Kyong Hwa, south Korean puppet foreign minister, when meeting Japan Prime Minister Abe during her junket to Japan some days ago, underscored the "importance of pressurizing the north through sanctions" through solidarity of the international community" and stressed that the relations with Japan are developing in "positive direction". At talks with Japan foreign minister she trumpeted about "cooperation to cope with the north's nuclear weapons" while finding fault with its "nuclear and missile issue". She even took the trouble to explain the content of the report on the examination of the "agreement" on sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and stooped to any infamy to ask for excuses, saying that "it is not consistent with the government stand".
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Saturday denounces this behavior of Kang Kyong Hwa as an intolerable act of treachery which disclosed the ambition of the present puppet authorities for stifling the fellow countrymen and their attitude of submitting to Japan. It goes on:
					
					 Shortly ago, the south Korean chief executive said that Japan is not an "ally" of south Korea in a bid to calm down the rebuff of the neighboring countries against south Korea getting keen on diplomacy with Japan. No sooner had the echoes of her remark disappeared than Kang flew to Japan where she made eyes at her Japanese masters, talking about "solution of relations" and "positive direction". This indicates that the puppet forces have come out with their sleeves rolled up to build triangular military alliance pursued by the U.S. through the "improvement of ties" with Japan on the sly.
					
					 It is a lesson of history that a nation harboring traitor seized by sycophancy and dependence on outsiders can neither defend its dignity and sovereignty nor can it evade shame and disaster.

articles.title: S. Korean Foreign Minister's Servile Junket to Japan Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Foreign Minister's Servile Junket to Japan Flailed
Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet Foreign Minister Kang Kyong Hwa flew to Japan on Dec. 19, according to reports.
					At her meeting with Abe, she fanned up Japan's moves for stifling the DPRK, stressing the "importance for the international community to put pressure on the north in unity".
					
					She even asked for the improvement of ties with Japan, while currying favor with her master by saying that the relations with Japan have taken a positive path.
					
					At talks with Japanese foreign minister she also asked for "cooperation with Japan over the nuclear issue of the north", stressing the need to put maximum pressure on the north through all means to tackle the "north's nuclear and missile provocation".
					
					She also went servile, asking for excuses over the mounting indignation of the south Koreans over the "agreement" on the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					It is really unsightly to see her parroting like a sparrow to ask for stifling the fellow countrymen while keeping mum about the past crimes committed by Japan.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Make Public Declaration on Situation for Peace
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Make Public Declaration on Situation for Peace
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and the 300-person Seoul Peace Council held a press conference outside Kwanghwamun on Dec. 20 and made public a declaration on the situation of 185 organizations in Seoul for peace of the Korean peninsula, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 Sanctions and military exercises against the north can never be a measure for peace on the Korean peninsula but the U.S. escalated the joint military exercises against the north through the involvement of nuclear carriers, Stealth fighters and nuclear strategic bombers and expanded their scope this year, too, steadily increasing the level of danger, the declaration said.
					
					 It stressed the need for the U.S. to cease military operations throughout the world and stop the evil cycle of the danger of war on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 It urged the U.S. to stop the joint military exercises with south Korea and opt for negotiations with the north for peace.
					
					 It stressed that the organizations would strive for lasting peace on the peninsula together with all citizens in Seoul with the movement of publishing the declaration on the situation as the beginning.

articles.title: Signature Campaign against Former S. Korean Prime Minister Launched
articles.content:
Signature Campaign against Former S. Korean Prime Minister Launched
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Former south Korean puppet Prime Minister Hwang Kyo An, top-class accomplice of traitor Park Geun Hye, was nominated as winner of "2018 Songgyun prize", a prize sponsored by the graduates' organization of Songgyungwan University, and in this regard there was launched a signature campaign denouncing traitor Hwang from Dec. 17 to 21, according to Voice of Seoul, south Korean internet newspaper.
					 The protesters denounced Hwang as a man behind the manipulation of the red herring of the Intelligence Service and intervention in election and obstruction to the investigation into the ferry Sewol sinking case as he was a key accomplice of Park Geun Hye who was meted out a punishment by 17 million candlelight demonstrators. 
					
					 Saying they can not repress indignation at Hwang, they demanded the disclosure of the circumstances around his nomination.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces U.S. for Escalating Confrontation
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces U.S. for Escalating Confrontation
Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea at a rally outside the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Dec. 19 denounced the U.S. for escalating confrontation in and around the Korean peninsula.
					The speakers at the rally recalled the U.S. trumpeted about cooperation for defending Japan and south Korea with missiles and disclosed this is aimed to build a triangular missile defence system with south Korea and Japan under the pretext of crisis on the Korean peninsula and a military alliance.
					
					They said that the military alliance among south Korea, U.S. and Japan is for the U.S. and Japan and is to escalate south-north confrontation and the crisis of nuclear confrontation in Northeast Asia, and thus hinders the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					They strongly accused U.S. of trying to build the military alliance under the pretext of the "north's nuclear and missile threats".
					
					The naval blockade against the north called for by the U.S. is so dangerous as to cause a military conflict in the Korean peninsula, they said, stressing that sanctions, pressure and military confrontation would never help solve the "north's nuclear and missile issue".
					
					They demanded the U.S. immediately halt the sanctions and pressure racket that can give rise to the bad cycle of confrontation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered at DPRK Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held at the DPRK missions in Cambodia, Iran, Myanmar, India, China, Romania, Angola and Equatorial Guinea on Dec. 9-16 to commemorate the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also works of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un and books and photos showing the achievements made by the Korean army and people in the building of a powerful socialist nation.
					
					 "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for Royal Palace and chairman of the Cambodian Committee for Remembering the Great Generalissimo HE Kim Jong Il, said that Kim Jong Il led the party, the state and the people with the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung as guidelines.
					
					 He made distinguished contribution to boosting the traditional ties of friendship and cooperation between the two countries and his feats will shine forever, the deputy prime minister added.
					
					 A vice-general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran praised Kim Jong Il's feats for the country and the people, the times and history.
					
					 Tin Tun, chairman of the Myanmar Committee for Remembering the Great HE Kim Jong Il, stressed that Kim Jong Il's lifelong exploits will remain long as priceless heritages guaranteeing the accomplishment of the DPRK's cause of building a powerful socialist state and the cause of global independence.
					
					 Families of Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle spoke of the love and care shown by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Russian Media Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats
articles.content:
Russian Media Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The press of Russia gave special write-ups to the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il from Dec. 8 to 13.
					 They carried a photo of Kim Jong Il and a photo of him and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un standing together.
					
					 The newspaper Byvor said the greatest feat of Kim Jong Il was that he defended the destiny of socialism.
					
					 He proved the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism and the inevitability of its victory through his energetic ideo-theoretical activities, thereby dealing a heavy blow to the imperialists keen on the anti-socialist moves, the paper added.
					
					 Zebri Deve, an online paper of Khabarovsk Territory, said that leader Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea, the Songun idea, founded by President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, and thus made the Korean people keep to the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 Internet news Erofei-Deve introduced the feats of Kim Jong Il, a great thinker-theoretician and a great master in leadership.
					
					 The online magazine Lemchich and website Patrioti Moskva praised his Songun leadership feats and elaborated on the fact that the cause of immortalizing the leader was successfully realized in the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Guinea
 Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was brought out in booklet in Guinea on Dec. 7 ahead of the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea. It also indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Segunda jornada de la V Conferencia de Presidentes de Celulas de PTC
articles.content:
Segunda jornada de la V Conferencia de Presidentes de Celulas de PTC
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 22 la segunda jornada de la V Conferencia de los Presidentes de las Celulas del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Los miembros del Consejo Ejecutivo del Comite Central del PTC, encabezados por el Presidente del PTC Kim Jong Un, salieron a la tribuna para dirigir la segunda jornada.
					
					Tambien, lo hicieron los cuadros directivos del Partido en el centro y las provincias.
					
					El conclave continuo bajo la direccion del Presidente del PTC.
					
					Los participantes en el conclave, quienes a traves de la primera jornada reconocieron mas profundamente la importancia del presente conclave en el trabajo de fortalecer por todos los medios el poderio combativo de nuestro Partido conforme a nueva demanda de la revolucion en desarrollo, discutieron seriamente las medidas para elevar el papel de los presidentes de las celulas y hacer de estas las organizaciones de fidelidad y filas vanguardistas para la materializacion de las politicas del Partido.
					
					En la segunda jornada se realizaron los discursos que analizan y balancean los exitos y experiencias logrados por los presidentes de las celulas partidistas de las unidades a todos los niveles en el fortalecimiento de las organizaciones de base y los defectos aparecidos en sus trabajos y sus motivos.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron a los exitos y las experiencias alcanzados en la labor para convertir las celulas partidistas en las organizaciones fieles, armadas con el espiritu de defender a riesgo de la vida al lider, y las verdaderas organizaciones vanguardistas que comparten hasta el fin la vida y la muerte con nuestro Partido.
					
					Ellos mencionaron que al fortalecer las celulas partidistas dieron prioridad a preparar a todos los militantes del Partido como verdaderos kimilsungistas y kimjongilistas y dirigieron con escrupulosidad la vida organizativo-ideologica partidista para que los miembros del Partido cumplan el papel vanguardista en la construccion de la potencia socialista.
					
					Escuchando los discursos, los participantes recordaron de nuevo el hecho de que el ejemplo personal de los presidentes de las celulas partidistas es precisamente la poderosa labor politica, y la justeza y la vitalidad del metodo de trabajo con las masas de nuestro Partido de convertir el trabajo de celulas en la labor con el alma de la gente.
					
					En el conclave fueron analizados las desviaciones y defectos de unas unidades en que el trabajo de las celulas no se realiza de acuerdo con la demanda de la epoca y la revolucion en desarrollo y fueron debatidos los remedios para superarlos.
					
					En las intervenciones fueron criticados los problemas de que unas celulas partidistas no han organizado y movilizado justamente a los militantes del Partido y los trabajadores a la materializacion de los legados del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, unos presidentes de celulas partidistas no se liberan del derrotismo, el formalismo, el oportunismo, el pancismo y otros erroneos puntos de vista ideologicos y el ocioso modo de trabajo, no prepararon bien las filas de los presidentes de celulas partidistas y no estructuraron las labores para ayudar y ensenar a los presidentes de celulas.
					
					Y fueron debatidas las medidas para que todos los presidentes de las celulas partidistas sean muy conscientes de su mision y deber asumidos en la materializacion de las politicas del Partido y logren nuevos cambios en el punto de vista ideologico y el modo de trabajo.
					
					La conferencia continua.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al nuevo presidente chileno
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al nuevo presidente chileno
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 21 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente electo de la Republica de Chile, Sebastian Pinera Echenique. 
					Convencido de que las relaciones entre los dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran en todos los dominios conforme a los intereses comunes de los dos pueblos, el remitente deseo exitos en las responsabilidades del mandatario chileno.

articles.title: Representante coreano manifiesta apoyo a la causa de Palestina y pueblos arabes
articles.content:
Representante coreano manifiesta apoyo a la causa de Palestina y pueblos arabes
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El representante permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU pronuncio un discurso en el debate de la agenda "Actos ilegales de Israel en Kuds oriental y otros territorios palestinos ocupados" durante la reunion especial emergente de la Asamblea General de la ONU, sesionada el dia 21.
					El orador menciono que la sociedad internacional hace ingentes esfuerzos por poner el punto final al antagonismo y contradiccion, que perduran durante mas de medio siglo entre Palestina e Israel, y asegurar la paz duradera en el Medio Oriente. 
					
					En la XVII Cumbre de los Paises No Alineados, celebrada en septiembre del ano pasado en Venezuela, fue reafirmada la posicion de proteger los intereses de los paises en vias de desarrollo, dijo y continuo:
					
					Y en diciembre del mismo ano, fue aprobada una resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU sobre el cese de la construccion ilegal de los asentamientos judios por parte de Israel en Cisjordania y Kuds oriental. 
					
					Sin embargo, el presidente estadounidense Trump tomo la decision de reconocer Kuds como capital de Israel y trasladar ahi la embajada de EE.UU.
					
					Esta decision merece la condena y repudio de todo el mundo porque significa un desprecio abierto e insulto a la legitimidad internacional y la unanime voluntad de la sociedad internacional.
					
					El estatus de Kuds es un asunto delicado que debera ser tratado imparcialmente a traves del rescate de los derechos nacionales del pueblo palestino y de la solucion comprensiva y duradera del problema del Medio Oriente.
					
					Recaera enteramente sobre EE.UU. e Israel la responsabilidad de las consecuencias de tension e inestabilidad que produzcan sus arbitrariedades en el Medio Oriente.
					
					Los dos paises deben tratar con sinceridad el proceso de paz del Medio Oriente prestando atencion merecida a los esfuerzos de la comunidad internacional por resolver el problema palestino y otros del Medio Oriente en virtud de la ley internacional y las resoluciones correspondientes de la ONU y de acuerdo con los intereses de Palestina y los pueblos arabes.
					
					Por ultimo, el representante manifesto el apoyo incondicional y solidaridad con la justa causa del pueblo palestino y los demas arabes por rescatar los legitimos derechos nacionales, incluso la fundacion del Estado independiente con Kuds oriental como capital.

articles.title: Presidium de la APS decide fundar la zona de desarrollo economico de Kangnam
articles.content:
Presidium de la APS decide fundar la zona de desarrollo economico de Kangnam
Pyongyang, 23 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea decidio fundar en algunas partes de la comuna de Ko-up del capitalino distrito de Kangnam la zona de desarrollo economico de Kangnam donde se ejercera la soberania de la RPDC.
					Quedo publicado el dia 21 el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la APS.
